name: Thousand Sunny
description: Built from Adam Tree wood by Franky and Galley-La shipwrights, twice the size of Going Merry
special_abilities: Gaon Cannon frontal attack, Coup De Burst propulsion system, Soldier Dock System with Mini Merry II and Shark Submerge III

name: Going Merry
description: First ship of Straw Hats, gifted by Kaya, developed its own spirit/klabautermann
special_abilities: Developed sentience, saved crew at Enies Lobby before receiving Viking funeral

name: Thriller Bark
description: Largest ship in One Piece, converted island from West Blue measuring several kilometers
special_abilities: Contains entire gothic island with mansion, can trap other ships inside walls

name: Moby Dick
description: Massive whale-shaped flagship, destroyed during Marineford War
special_abilities: Huge size accommodating hundreds of crew, whale figurehead

name: Red Force
description: Red-hulled flagship with large sails and palm trees on deck
special_abilities: Extremely durable, withstood Kaido encounter, can travel Grand Line swiftly

name: Queen Mama Chanter
description: Animated ship with face, part of Big Mom's homie network
special_abilities: Can sing, sentient ship powered by Big Mom's soul, multiple paddle wheels

name: Polar Tang
description: Yellow submarine with Heart Pirates jolly roger, advanced medical facilities
special_abilities: Can submerge and travel underwater undetected, equipped with surgical room for Law

name: Victoria Punk
description: Featured wicked skull prow, destroyed by Shanks
special_abilities: Heavily armed with cannons and punk aesthetic fitting Kid's style

name: Perfume Yuda
description: Red ship pulled by two giant sea serpents (Yuda)
special_abilities: Can traverse Calm Belt using sea serpents to pull the ship

name: Oro Jackson
description: Legendary ship of Pirate King, built by Tom from Adam Tree wood
special_abilities: Built by legendary shipwright Tom, carried Roger to Laugh Tale

name: Flying Dutchman
description: Cursed ship that can travel above and below water
special_abilities: Can navigate surface and underwater, ghostly appearance with torn sails

name: Nostra Castello
description: Paddle ship resembling fortress, uses tank treads instead of sails
special_abilities: Built around Bege's fortress devil fruit power, tank treads for propulsion

name: Maxim
description: Golden flying ship powered by electricity
special_abilities: Can fly using electric propulsion, made of gold, massive size

name: Baratie
description: Fish-shaped floating restaurant captained by Zeff
special_abilities: Battle fins for combat, functions as both restaurant and ship

name: Big Top
description: Circus-themed ship with big top tent design and bright colors
special_abilities: Reflects Buggy's circus theme with colorful carnival aesthetic

name: Striker
description: Small one-man boat powered by Ace's fire abilities
special_abilities: Propelled by Ace's fire powers, fast and maneuverable

name: Hitsugibune
description: Tiny coffin-shaped raft with candles and cross-shaped mast
special_abilities: Remarkably seaworthy despite tiny size, fits Mihawk's gothic aesthetic

name: Snapper Head
description: Ship of Sun Pirates with sun symbol hiding slave marks
special_abilities: Represents freedom for fishmen, sun jolly roger

name: Sexy Foxy
description: Large ship with fox figurehead that shoots Slow-Slow beams
special_abilities: Fox figurehead can emit Slow-Slow beams matching Foxy's devil fruit

name: Numancia Flamingo
description: Pink ship with flamingo figurehead, reflects Doflamingo's style
special_abilities: Bright pink matching Doflamingo's flamboyant personality

name: Yonta Maria
description: Colossal flagship of Standing Kingdom's fleet, accommodates thousands
special_abilities: Enormous size housing thousands of crew, classic European tall ship design

name: Liberal Hind
description: Resembles Marine battleship, may be Drake's former Marine vessel
special_abilities: Marine battleship design, possibly from Drake's time as Marine

name: Bezan Black
description: Blackbeard's original raft, later upgraded to larger vessel
special_abilities: Simple raft that carried Blackbeard early in his pirate career

name: Saber of Xebec
description: Current massive flagship of Blackbeard Pirates with three skull jolly roger
special_abilities: Heavily armed, fearsome appearance matching Blackbeard's reputation

name: Utan Sonar
description: Orange ship with orangutan theme, large trees as masts, paddle wheels
special_abilities: Equipped for underwater treasure hunting, uses echolocation for searching

name: Miss Love Duck
description: Duck-shaped ship used by Mr. 2 Bon Clay
special_abilities: Duck design fitting Bon Clay's eccentric personality

name: Bliking
description: Ship of Bellamy before joining Doflamingo's crew
special_abilities: Standard pirate vessel with Bellamy's jolly roger

name: Little Gerais
description: Part of Germa Kingdom's fleet, can combine with other ships
special_abilities: Transforms and combines with other Germa ships to form Germa Kingdom landmass

name: Mammoth
description: Jack's flagship with mammoth figurehead, heavily armored
special_abilities: Armored ship reflecting Jack the Drought's mammoth zoan form

name: New Witch's Tongue
description: Ship used by Fisher Tiger before Sun Pirates formation
special_abilities: Used during Fisher Tiger's heroic slave-freeing missions

name: Cutie Wagon
description: Pirate ship encountered by Straw Hats in Paradise
special_abilities: Standard pirate vessel with Rolling Pirates jolly roger

name: Victory Hunter
description: Secondary ship of Foxy Pirates fleet
special_abilities: Part of Foxy's extensive fleet for Davy Back Fights

name: Takoyaki 8
description: Floating takoyaki restaurant run by Hatchan
special_abilities: Octopus-themed floating takoyaki stand

name: Sabagashira I
description: Ship of Caribou brothers before capture
special_abilities: Standard pirate ship sunk by X Drake

name: Saint Germain
description: Luxurious ship used by Celestial Dragons
special_abilities: Opulent design befitting World Nobles' status

name: Kuri
description: Traditional Wano-style vessel
special_abilities: Traditional Japanese ship design from Wano Country

name: Pluton
description: One of three Ancient Weapons, massive battleship capable of destroying islands
special_abilities: Can destroy entire islands with single shot, built in Water 7

name: Noah
description: Massive ship half the size of Fishman Island, meant to carry population
special_abilities: Enormous ark capable of carrying entire Fishman Island population to surface

name: Marine Battleship
description: Standard Marine warship with Seastone hull
special_abilities: Seastone-lined hull allows Calm Belt travel, multiple cannons, four masts

name: Garp's Warship
description: Garp's personal dog-themed battleship with bone masts
special_abilities: Bone-shaped masts, dog theme, conveyor belts for Garp's cannonballs
